title: American GQ Magazine Serif in Body Text
author: gdec

comments.content:
mmm.. are you sure? because the apostrophe is different.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083328/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller/")

i typed in the first line there and its off

Akira is always right :)

If you go to the glyph table here:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller/MillerTextRoman-Normal/gl...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083328/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller/MillerTextRoman-Normal/glyphs.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller/MillerTextRoman-Normal/glyphs.html")  
... and scroll down, you can find your text's apostrophe at the "right single quotation mark" position.
Oh I see, great thank you so much!
